title: Sesko eases pressure on Amorim as Manchester United avoid Sunderland slip
summary: Manchester United secured a 2-0 Premier League victory over Sunderland with first-half goals from Mason Mount and Benjamin Sesko. The win reinforces United's strong form in the league. This match added to the team's confidence as they continue their campaign.

title: Bukayo Saka is spot-on to seal stroll past West Ham and keeps Arsenal flying
summary: Declan Rice and Bukayo Saka each scored as Arsenal secured a comfortable 2-0 victory over West Ham. The win highlights Arsenal's strong performance in the match. It reinforces their position in the league standings.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
